intro:
Decorate the streets with cuteness! You're a future artist!
Take on this logic puzzle with simple rules!
description:
You are a future artist! Solve puzzles and color the streets with your art!

Nurilogy 1000 is a logic puzzle game with simple rules.
Follow the rules below to paint the blank squares:
① Numbers on the board show how many blank squares are surrounded by paint.
 Each group of blank squares contains exactly one number.
② All painted squares must be connected.
③ Do not create painted blocks larger than 2×2.

Clear the stage by painting correctly according to the rules!

There are 1,000 stages to play! Rankings supported!
